welcome_message_title: Welcome to Saint Annes on the Sea
welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Saint Annes on the Sea, a charming seaside town known for its stunning coastline and vibrant local community. We invite you to explore our beautiful city and soak up all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Blackpool Airport handles both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Warton Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Warton Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Walney Island Airport offers a range of amenities for travelers, including shops, restaurants, and lounges.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Liverpool John Lennon Airport offers a modern and efficient travel experience for passengers.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Terminal 2 at Liverpool John Lennon Airport is a smaller terminal used for budget airlines and domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
